  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83612</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Forces agissant sur une étoile pendant ses étapes de  la vie</string>
            <string language="en">Forces acting on a star during its life stages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erzwingt das Fungieren auf einem Stern während 
seiner Lebenstadien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força agir em uma estrela durante seus estágios
da vida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza comportarsi su una stella durante le 
relative fasi di vita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις που ενεργούν σε ένα αστέρι κατά τη διάρκεια
των σταδίων ζωής του</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza actuar en una estrella durante sus etapas 
de la vida</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Première sur trois illustrations montrant les forces  agissant sur une étoile pendant les étapes de sa vie. Les  forces centripètes dues à sa propre pesanteur tendront à provoquer l'effondrement de l'étoile.</string>
            <string language="en">First of three illustrations showing the forces acting on a star during its life stages. The inward forces due to its own gravity will tend to make the star collapse.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Les forces</string>
            <string language="en">Forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pesanteur</string>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étapes de la vie</string>
            <string language="en">life stages</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la masse</string>
            <string language="en">Mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fusion  nucléaire</string>
            <string language="en">nuclear fusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoile</string>
            <string language="en">stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von drei Abbildungen, welche die Kräfte 
fungieren auf einem Stern während seiner Lebenstadien zeigen. 
Die inneren Kräfte wegen seiner eigenen Schwerkraft neigen, den
Stern einstürzen zu lassen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de três ilustrações que mostram 
as forças que agem em uma estrela durante seus estágios da vida. 
As forças internas  devido a sua própria gravidade tenderão a
fazer a estrela desmoronar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di tre illustrazioni che mostrano 
le forze che si comportano su una stella durante le relative fasi di 
vita. Le forze interne dovuto la relativa propria gravità 
tenderanno a fare la stella sprofondare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τις δυνάμεις 
που ενεργούν σε ένα αστέρι κατά τη διάρκεια των σταδίων ζωής 
του. Οι εσωτερικές δυνάμεις λόγω στη βαρύτητά της θα 
τείνουν να κάνουν την κατάρρευση αστεριών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de tres ilustraciones que muestran las 
fuerzas que actúan en una estrella durante sus etapas de la vida. 
Las fuerzas internas  debido a su propia gravedad tenderán para
hacer que la estrella se derrumba.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebenstadien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
